articles.title: Kim Jong Un Pays Unofficial Visit to China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Pays Unofficial Visit to China
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, paid an unofficial visit to China from March 25 to 28 at the invitation of Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, president of the People's Republic of China and chairman of the Central Military Commission.
					 He was accompanied by his wife Ri Sol Ju. Among his suite members were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, vice-chairman of the SAC of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Pak Kwang Ho, Ri Su Yong and Kim Yong Chol, members of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK and vice-chairmen of the C.C., WPK, Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho, member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, Jo Yong Won, Kim Song Nam and Kim Pyong Ho, vice department directors of the WPK Central Committee, and members of the SAC of the DPRK.
					
					 When the special train carrying Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un arrived in Dandong, Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the CPC Central Committee, Chen Qiufa, secretary of the Liaoning Provincial Committee of the CPC, Lu Dongfu, general manager of the China Railway Corporation, Li Jinjun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, Liu Huanxin, member of the Standing Committee and secretary-general of the Liaoning Provincial Committee of the CPC, and Ge Haiying, secretary of the Dandong City Committee of the CPC, greeted him.
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed thanks to Song Tao and his party for greeting him at the border city far away from Beijing.
					
					 Song Tao warmly welcomed Kim Jong Un and his wife Ri Sol Ju's visit to China, noting he came from Beijing upon authorization of Xi Jinping.
					
					 Kim Jong Un arrived in Beijing on March 26.
					
					 He was greeted by Wang Huning, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and member of the CPC Central Committee Secretariat, Ding Xuexiang, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, member of the CPC Central Committee Secretariat and director of the CPC Central Committee General Office, Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the CPC Central Committee, Lu Dongfu, general manager of the China Railway Corporation, and Li Jinjun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 He exchanged greetings with the leading party and government officials of China who greeted him.
					
					 The motorcade carrying him and his wife headed for the Diaoyutai State Guesthouse, escorted by 21 motorcycles.
					
					 A ceremony for welcoming Kim Jong Un's visit to China took place with splendor at the Great Hall of the People.
					
					 There were talks between Kim Jong Un and Xi Jinping.
					
					 At the end of the talks Xi Jinping and his wife Peng Liyuan presented to Kim Jong Un gifts they prepared with sincerity. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed thanks to them.
					
					 Xi Jinping hosted a grand banquet at the Great Hall of the People, warmly welcoming Kim Jong Un's visit to China.
					
					 On March 27 Kim Jong Un visited an exhibition house showing the signal successes made by the Chinese Academy of Sciences after the 18th CPC Congress.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Pak Kwang Ho, Ri Su Yong, Kim Yong Chol, Ri Yong Ho and other suite members.
					
					 He was also accompanied by Wang Huning, Ding Xuexiang, Cai Qi and Song Tao.
					
					 He looked round the exhibits, being briefed on the successes made in the field of natural science and technology such as nuclear physics, space technology, agriculture and energy.
					
					 He made the following entry in the visitors' book: We can grasp the mightiness of China, a great neighboring country. More excellent scientific successes will be achieved under the wise leadership of the Communist Party of China. Kim Jong Un on March 27, 2018.
					
					 That day the Supreme Leader and his wife were invited to a luncheon hosted by Xi Jinping and Peng Liyuan at Yangyuanzhai of the Diaoyutai State Guesthouse.
					
					 After the luncheon, Kim Jong Un exchanged good-byes with Xi Jinping.
					
					 He left Beijing in the afternoon of March 27 after winding up his unofficial visit to China.
					
					 He was warmly seen off by Wang Huning, Ding Xuexiang and Song Tao at Beijing Railway Station.
					
					 Song Tao, Lu Dongfu and Li Jinjun traveled together with Kim Jong Un to Dandong Railway Station to see him off.
					
					 Leaving Dandong Railway Station, the Supreme Leader sent a message of thanks to Xi Jinping for having accorded cordial hospitality with utmost sincerity to him in token of warm comradely friendship and friendly feelings during his China visit.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Talks with Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Talks with Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- There were talks between Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, and Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, president of the People's Republic of China and chairman of the Central Military Commission, at the Great Hall of the People on March 26.
					 The supreme leaders of the two parties and two countries of the DPRK and the PRC exchanged views on important matters including the development of the DPRK-China friendly relations and the issue of handling the situation of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Kim Jong Un said that he was pleased to have the first significant meeting with Xi Jinping.
					
					 He said that it is the fixed determination of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK to carry forward the precious tradition of the DPRK-China friendship, provided and strengthened by the leaders of elder generations of the two countries, and put it on a new high stage as required by the developing era.
					
					 He talked about the need to meet often Chinese comrades including Xi Jinping to further deepen friendship and strengthen the strategic communication and strategic and tactical cooperation so as to consolidate the unity and cooperation between the two countries.
					
					 He voiced his expectation that the Chinese people would achieve shining successes in the cause of building modern and powerful socialist country in the new era and in the struggle to realize China's dream of the great prosperity of the Chinese nation under the correct leadership of the Communist Party of China with Xi Jinping at the core.
					
					 Xi Jinping warmly welcomed Kim Jong Un for visiting China as his maiden foreign trip.
					
					 He stressed that it is the strategic option and unshakable will of the Chinese party and government to attache importance to and steadily carry forward and develop the Sino-DPRK friendship which the leaders of elder generations personally provided and nurtured with sincerity in the course of contributing to the victorious advance of the socialist cause, out of common ideal, faith and deep revolutionary friendship.
					
					 The recent positive change observed in the situation of the Korean peninsula is a fruition of strategic decision made by Kim Jong Un and the efforts exerted by the party and government of the DPRK, he said.
					
					 He expressed the conviction that under the leadership of Kim Jong Un the Workers' Party of Korea would register fresh successes in steadily advancing along the socialist path, developing the economy and improving the standard of people's living by guiding the Korean people.
					
					 Kim Jong Un invited, on behalf of the party and government of the DPRK, Xi Jinping to make an official visit to the DPRK at a convenient time and the invitation was accepted with pleasure.
					
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were Ri Su Yong and Kim Yong Chol, members of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and vice-chairmen of the WPK Central Committee, and Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					 Present from the PRC side were Wang Huning, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and member of the CPC Central Committee Secretariat, Ding Xuexiang, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, member of the CPC Central Committee Secretariat and director of the CPC Central Committee General Office, Huang Kunming, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, member of its Secretariat and head of its Publicity Department, Yang Jiechi, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, Wang Yi, state councilor and minister of Foreign Affairs, and Song Tao, head of the International Liaison Department of the CPC Central Committee.

articles.title: Ceremony Welcoming Kim Jong Un Held at China's Great Hall of People
articles.content:
Ceremony Welcoming Kim Jong Un Held at China's Great Hall of People
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A grand ceremony took place at the Great Hall of the People on March 26 to welcome Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, and his wife Ri Sol Ju who are paying an unofficial visit to the People's Republic of China.
					 When respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, together with his wife arrived at the Great Hall of the People, Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, president of the PRC and chairman of the Central Military Commission, and his wife Peng Liyuan warmly greeted them.
					
					 Kim Jong Un and Xi Jinping shook hands with each other.
					
					 Xi Jinping warmly welcomed Kim Jong Un's maiden foreign visit to China.
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed deep thanks for Xi Jinping's warm care and hospitality for his visit.
					
					 Kim Jong Un and Ri Sol Ju had a photo session with Xi Jinping and Peng Liyuan.
					
					 Kim Jong Un exchanged greetings with the Chinese party and government officials, shaking hands with them one by one at Beidating.
					
					 When Kim Jong Un and Xi Jinping stood on the platform, the national anthems of the two countries were played.
					
					 Kim Jong Un received a salute from the chief of the guard of honor of the three services of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (CPLA).
					
					 He reviewed the guard of honor of the CPLA three services, conducted by Xi Jinping.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Speech at Banquet
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Speech at Banquet
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un made a speech at the grand banquet hosted by Xi Jinping at the Great Hall of the People.
					 Kim Jong Un said that he made a visit to the People's Republic of China like lightning with the sole desire to invariably maintain the long-standing historical tradition of great DPRK-China friendship, to live up to the revolutionary obligation and to creditably carry forward and develop the relations between the DPRK and the PRC generation after generation under the new situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 He expressed his heartfelt gratitude to General Secretary Xi Jinping and his wife Peng Liyuan for devoting their time and according warm and cordial hospitality just as they would do for their own brothers and sisters, though being busy with the party and state affairs.
					
					 He said that he was deeply moved by the sincerity and deep consideration shown by Xi Jinping and leading officials of the Chinese party and state so that the successful visit would be made in a short period after gladly accepting the proposal for the visit, and noted that he was very thankful for it.
					
					 He warmly congratulated Xi Jinping on his election as president of the People's Republic of China and chairman of the Central Military Commission of the PRC after the successful conclusion of "two conferences" following the grand 19th Congress of the Communist Party of China.
					
					 It is quite natural that the capital of China was chosen for his maiden foreign trip, he noted, adding it is also a noble obligation of him who has to value the DPRK-China friendship as his own life and carry it forward generation after generation.
					
					 The peoples of Korea and China, who have closely supported and cooperated by dedicating their blood and life to the protracted joint struggle, have clearly realized in their life experience that their destinies are inseparable and how valuable the peaceful environment and stability in the region are for the two countries, fraternal neighbors who are linked by the same river, and how costly it is to win and defend them, he added.
					
					 He said that he together with Xi Jinping had an in-depth exchange of views on important matters including the development of the DPRK-China friendly relations and the urgent issue of handling the situation of the Korean peninsula and affirmed the shared will to consolidate the socialist systems in the two countries and provide the two peoples with happiness and future.
					
					 He noted that it is the unshakable stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to develop on a new stage the DPRK-China friendly relationship which was forged in the sacred common struggle for the socialist cause and which has maintained its nature despite all tempests of history, true to the noble intention of the preceding leaders.
					
					 The WPK and the people of the DPRK are rejoiced as over their own over the fact that the Chinese people have registered signal achievements in the cause of building a modern and powerful socialist country in the new era and the international prestige of China is rising as the days go by under the guidance of the Communist Party of China with General Secretary Xi Jinping at the core, he pointed out.
					
					 Kim Jong Un sincerely hoped that the Chinese people would brilliantly carry out the tasks set forth by the 19th Congress of the CPC and achieve great prosperity of China under the guidance of General Secretary Xi Jinping.

articles.title: Xi Jinping's Speech at Banquet
articles.content:
Xi Jinping's Speech at Banquet
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Xi Jinping made a speech at a grand banquet arranged in welcome of the China visit by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 He said that the visit by Chairman Kim Jong Un is the one of great significance at a special time, and it suffices to prove that Chairman Kim Jong Un and the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea attach utmost importance to the relations between the two parties and two countries of China and the DPRK. It is also of weighty significance in deepening the communication between the two sides, strengthening cooperation and promoting partnership, he added.
					
					 He said the visit would make an important contribution to putting the relations between the two parties and two countries on a new stage and promoting the regional peace, stability and development at a new historical time.
					
					 The traditional Sino-DPRK friendship was personally provided and cultivated with much effort by the leaders of elder generations of the two parties and two countries, he said.
					
					 He noted that President Kim Il Sung visited China over 40 times in his lifetime, forging deep friendly feelings with the Chinese leaders of elder generation including Chairman Mao Zedong and Premier Zhou Enlai.
					
					 The traditional Sino-DPRK friendship is the unique one in the world that has been sealed in blood, and it provides the two parties and two peoples with happiness just as a luxuriant tree with deep roots and a never-drying spring, he pointed out.
					
					 When General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited China in May 2010, he said that the DPRK-China friendship is a heritage provided and bequeathed down to us by the revolutionaries of elder generation and that it is our historic and strategic option and unshakable stand to value it generation after generation, Xi Jinping said.
					
					 He said he had talks with Kim Jong Un in a friendly atmosphere.
					
					 We reached a consensus that it is in the common interests of both sides and a strategic option common to both sides to carry forward and glorify the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship, he said, adding:
					
					 We are convinced that no matter how the international and regional situations may change, both sides would take firm control of the general trend of the world development and the over-all phase of the development of Sino-DPRK relations, strengthen high-level visits, deepen strategic communication, and expand exchanges and cooperation, thereby providing the two countries and peoples with happiness.
					
					 At present the Chinese party, government and people are striving and struggling to realize the "second one hundred year" goal and the dream of China, i.e. great prosperity of the Chinese nation, under the strategic assignments set forth by the 19th Congress of the Communist Party of China.
					
					 Xi Jinping, said that the diligent and resourceful Korean people are making redoubled efforts to build a socialist economic power under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Chairman Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He voiced firm support to the Korean comrades in their active efforts for defending the political stability and promoting the economic development and hoped that they would steadily make new greater successes in the cause of socialist construction in Korea, adding he is convinced of it.

articles.title: Xi Jinping Hosts Banquet for Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Xi Jinping Hosts Banquet for Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, president of the People's Republic of China and chairman of the Central Military Commission, hosted a grand banquet in welcome of the China visit by Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, at the Great Hall of the People on March 26.
					 Kim Jong Un and his wife Ri Sol Ju entered the banquet hall, guided by Xi Jinping and his wife Peng Liyuan.
					
					 All the participants in the banquet warmly welcomed the supreme leaders of the two parties and two countries.
					
					 Prior to the banquet, they watched a video on the activities of the leaders of the two parties and two countries who provided and nurtured the roots of the DPRK-China friendship.
					
					 The viewers were impressed by scenes showing the lifetime of the leaders of the elder generation including President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Comrades Mao Zedong, Zhou Enlai, Deng Xiaoping, Jiang Zemin, Hu Jintao and Xi Zhongxun.
					
					 At the banquet Xi Jinping made a congratulatory speech and Kim Jong Un made a reply speech.
					
					 The banquet proceeded in a comradely, fraternal and amicable atmosphere.
					
					 At the banquet there was an art performance specially prepared by Chinese artistes to welcome Kim Jong Un's China visit.
					
					 Kim Jong Un and his wife Ri Sol Ju conveyed a floral basket to the performers who showed hospitality through the excellent performance and mounted the stage together with Xi Jinping and his wife Peng Liyuan to have a souvenir picture taken with them.
					
					 Present at the banquet on invitation were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK, vice-chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission and vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee; Pak Kwang Ho, Ri Su Yong and Kim Yong Chol, members of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and vice-chairmen of the WPK Central Committee; Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho, member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee; and other officials accompanying Kim Jong Un and suite members.
					
					 Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador to China, and his embassy officials were also invited.
					
					 Attending it were Li Keqiang, premier of the State Council of the PRC and Wang Huning, member of the CPC Central Committee Secretariat, who are members of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, Wang Qishan, vice-president of the PRC, Ding Xuexiang, member of the Political Bureau, member of the Secretariat and director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee, Yang Jiechi, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, Guo Shengkun, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Committee of the CPC Central Committee, Huang Kunming, member of the Political Bureau, member of the Secretariat and head of the Publicity Department of the CPC Central Committee, Cai Qi, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and secretary of the Beijing Municipal Committee of the CPC, Wang Yi, member of the State Council and minister of Foreign Affairs, Song Tao, head of the International Liai
					
					 son Department of the CPC Central Committee, and other officials of the Chinese party and government.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Invited to Luncheon Hosted by Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Invited to Luncheon Hosted by Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and his wife Ri Sol Ju were invited to a luncheon hosted by Xi Jinping and his wife Peng Liyuan at Yangyuanzhai of the Diaoyutai State Guesthouse on March 27.
					 Xi Jinping and Peng Liyuan warmly greeted Kim Jong Un and Ri Sol Ju upon their arrival at Yangyuanzhai.
					
					 Yangyuanzhai is an old cultural site built in 1773 as a special palace of Qing Emperor Qianlong. It is a time-honored place where President Kim Il Sung deepened friendly feelings with the preceding leaders of China.
					
					 Kim Jong Un together with Ri Sol Ju exchanged warm greetings with Xi Jinping and Peng Liyuan and had a souvenir photo taken with them.
					
					 He expressed thanks for having arranged a special luncheon in a homey atmosphere and invited them to it, and had meaningful talk with Xi Jinping.
					
					 At the talk the supreme leaders of the two parties and two countries unreservedly talked about their own opinions and views on many diverse issues, deepening friendship.
					
					 Then, Xi Jinping and Peng Liyuan told Kim Jong Un and Ri Sol Ju about tea culture of China, and guided them to the luncheon hall.
					
					 The luncheon hall where Kim Jong Un and Ri Sol Ju sat face to face with Xi Jinping and Peng Liyuan was overflowing with a harmonious and intimate atmosphere from its beginning to the end.
					
					 That day Kim Jong Un and Ri Sol Ju presented gifts to Xi Jinping and Peng Liyuan prepared by them with sincerity.
					
					 At the end of the luncheon Kim Jong Un once again expressed thanks to Xi Jinping for the warm hospitality during the visit, and exchanged farewells with him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Thanks to Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Thanks to Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a message of thanks to Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and president of the People's Republic of China, on Wednesday.
					 In the message Kim Jong Un said:
					
					 On my way back after my first successful visit to our friendly neighbor the People's Republic of China, I'd like to express my heartfelt gratitude to you and officials and people of the central organ and Beijing City who greeted us with sincerity and showed heartwarming hospitality.
					
					 Our first meeting at an important time when the socialist cause of the peoples of the two countries has entered the phase of new development marked a wonderful occasion that provided an epoch-making landmark for carrying forward and developing the traditional DPRK-China friendship as required by the new era.
					
					 Satisfied with the consensus of views that was reached on issues of mutual concern with you during our meeting and talks, I am convinced that the DPRK-China friendship, a valuable heritage bequeathed down by the revolutionary forerunners and common treasure, would as ever steadily strengthen in the interests of the two peoples.
					
					 I wish the fraternal Chinese people great successes in building socialism with Chinese characteristics in the new era under the leadership of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China with you at the core, and wish you good health.

articles.title: Russians Visit Kunja Revolutionary Museum
articles.content:
Russians Visit Kunja Revolutionary Museum
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Russian embassy officials visited the Kunja Revolutionary Museum Wednesday on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of the conclusion of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
					Being briefed on the fact that President Kim Il Sung came here during the last Fatherland Liberation War to encourage the workers of munitions industry and people to wartime production, the guests looked round the exhibited historic mementos and data.
					
					Earlier, they toured the DPRK-Russia Friendship Moranbong Secondary School No. 1 and the Ryugyong Kimchi Factory.

articles.title: Fifth National Three-Revolution Teams Technological Innovation Exhibition Closes
articles.content:
Fifth National Three-Revolution Teams Technological Innovation Exhibition Closes
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The Fifth National Three-Revolution Teams Technological Innovation Exhibition closed with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House on Mar. 28.
					 Introduced at the exhibition were data on achievements made by members of three-revolution teams dispatched to various sectors including electric power, metal, chemical, coal, machine industries.
					
					 The technological innovation achievements made by the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex, Chollima Steel Complex, Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, etc. were appreciated as they were significant in practice.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Kim Phyong Hae, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Jon Kwang Ho, vice-premier of the Cabinet, and officials concerned of commissions, ministries and national institutions and exemplary members of three-revolution teams and officials of the units which dispatched the teams.

articles.title: National Symposium on Medical Science Held
articles.content:
National Symposium on Medical Science Held
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A national symposium on medical science took place at the Sci-Tech Complex on Tuesday and Wednesday to mark the 50th anniversary of the publication of President Kim Il Sung's work "On Combating Epidemics More Effectively".
					Present there were officials concerned, medical workers, scientists, technicians and teachers in the field of public health.
					
					More than 250 valuable theses which were achieved in the field of medical science true to the tasks set forth in the work of the President were heard at the symposium.
					
					It was divided into panels of hepatitis, tuberculosis, hygiene and anti-epidemic.
					
					 Appreciated were research papers which made public by teachers and medical workers of Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University, the Institute of Medical Science, Preventive Hospital No. 2 of the Ministry of Public Health, Preventive Hospital No. 3 of the Ministry of Public Health, Preventive Hospital No. 2 of Pyongyang City and the National Hygienic and Anti-epidemic Center, etc, as they have great significance in clinical practice.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- New stamps (one sheet) showing the tea culture of Korea were issued in the DPRK.
					 Seen in the tea leaf-shaped sheet are three stamps introducing Unjong tea (Kangryong black and green teas) and Kaesong Koryo Insam (ginseng) tea against the pictures of the Kangryong Unjong Tea-growing District and some contents of history book "Samguksagi (Chronicles of the Three Kingdoms)" that summarizes the tea plantation started from the period of the Three Kingdoms (early 3rd century B.C.-middle 7th century A.D.) in Korea.
					
					 The tea culture of Korea associated with the wisdom of ancestors has been brought into full bloom in the era of the Workers' Party to be conducive to promoting health and emotional life of people.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on Ulterior Aim behind Dialogue
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on Ulterior Aim behind Dialogue
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean military warmongers get frantic with the north-targeted arms build-up and military confrontation with the north, swimming against the trend towards the improvement of the inter-Korean ties.
					 They are going to purchase over 170 long-range air-to-ground Taurus missiles from Germany in March and then more than 90 ones between 2019 and 2020 in a bid to introduce new striking means for precision strike at major military installations in the north in the event of contingency.
					
					 They claim that they will provide the air force with 40 U.S. F-35A stealth fighters for real war. They also claim that as the New OPLAN the keynote of which is to completely neutralize our leadership and main forces within some hours' time has been completed, they are examining a plan to purchase over 2,600 ballistic missiles of various missions earlier than the set time to carry it out.
					
					 What does the reckless action taken by the trigger-happy forces for arms build-up and military confrontation with the north behind the curtain of the dialogue show?
					
					 It is the revelation of the ulterior intention to block the trend towards the improvement of the north-south relations provided with so much effort and to stand against the north by force of arms to the last.
					
					 Are the massive introduction of Taurus, which is called the main means of the Kill Chain, the system of preemptive strike at the north, and of other striking means targeting the strategic vantages of the north and the creation of the task force brigade for attacking long-range guns of the north related to the dialogue and the improvement of the inter-Korean relations?
					
					 It is height of impudence to talk about dialogue with hostile approach to strike dialogue partner.
					
					 Such provocations are the reckless action to follow in the footsteps of the former conservative regimes that destroyed the inter-Korean relations and caused vicious cycles of confrontation, crying out for the "confrontation accompanied by dialogue".
					
					 It is impossible to talk about genuine reconciliation and unity with a dagger in one's belt and any agreement will be a dead document.
					
					 It is a serous lesson drawn from the north-south relations full of ups and downs.
					
					 It has been proved by the crimes of the "yusin" dictator who agreed at the historic July 4 joint statement but made it a dead document and run amuck for confrontation, crying out for the "confrontation accompanied by dialogue," and the ones of the groups of traitors Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye who blatantly violated the precious agreements common to the nation and drove the inter-Korean relations to catastrophe.
					
					 Dialogue and confrontation can not go together.
					
					 The ill-boding military confrontation racket under the eyes of the north shows that the south Korean authorities dream of something else, though they are paying lip service to dialogue and peace.
					
					 The inter-Korean ties and the situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula call for prudent remarks and actions.
					
					 The foolish act to threaten and provoke us by force of arms must be stopped.
					
					 The "confrontation accompanied by dialogue" will result in irrevocable ruin.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Foreign media featured articles from Mar. 11 to 19 to observe the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 A special write-up was posted on the Russian internet homepage Patrioti Moskva with a portrait of smiling President.
					
					 It said:
					
					 Human history knows many famous men but there is no such a great man as President Kim Il Sung of socialist Korea who is boundlessly revered by all people century after century.
					
					 One of his greatest exploits is that he founded the Juche idea and thus indicated the path to be covered by humankind.
					
					 It detailed his life as a genuine internationalist.
					
					 Another website Today's DPRK introduced what famous personages of various countries said to praise his personality as a great man with his photos.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung of the DPRK is a peerlessly great man highly praised by all, irrespective of their idea, social system, political view and religious belief, it said, adding that he will be always remembered by humankind as a prominent leader representing the 20th century.
					
					 An article dealing with the International Kim Il Sung Prize was posted with photos on the Russian online magazine Lemchich.
					
					 A Bangladesh newspaper said that his august name means the sun, adding it is shining as a symbol of national liberation, the era of independence, noble virtue and sense of obligation and the banner of eternal victory. Streets, institutions and organizations of many countries were named after his august name, it noted.
					
					 A preparatory committee of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung posted on its website an article dealing with the exploits of the President who built the socialist system centered on the popular masses in Korea, regarding it as its maxim to believe in the people as in Heaven.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked by Russian Political Party
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked by Russian Political Party
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed by the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia on March 19.
					 Sazhi Umalatova, chairwoman of the party, was elected chairwoman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in UK
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in UK
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A UK preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated in London on March 19.
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee fixed the celebration period from March 19 to April 15 and decided to give publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of the President and hold diverse political and cultural events in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Ethiopia
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was brought out in pamphlet with due ceremony on Mar. 21 by the Penguin Publishing House of Ethiopia on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun.)
					 The work, issued on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by the President and leader Kim Jong Il throughout their lives.
					
					 It also indicates tasks to firmly preserve and glorify the idea and exploits of the President and the leader.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un realiza visita extraoficial a la Republica Popular China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un realiza visita extraoficial a la Republica Popular China
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, realizo desde el dia 25 hasta el 28 de marzo una visita extraoficial a la Republica Popular China cumplimentando la invitacion de Xi Jinping, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la RPCh y de su Comision Militar Central.
					Le acompanaron su senora Ri Sol Ju y Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y del CC del PTC, Pak Kwang Ho, Ri Su Yong y Kim Yong Chol, miembros del Buro Politico y vicepresidentes del CC del PTC, Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y ministro de Relaciones Exteriores, y Jo Yong Won, Kim Song Nam y Kim Pyong Ho, subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, y los miembros del Comite de Estado de la RPDC.
					
					Cuando Kim Jong Un llego en tren especial a Dandong, le recibieron en la estacion ferroviaria Song Tao, jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, Chen Qiufa, secretario del Comite Provincial del PCCh en Liaoning, Lu Dongfu, administrador general de la Corporacion de Ferrocarril de China, Li Jinjun, embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de China en la RPDC, Liu Huanxin, miembro permanente y secretario general del Comite Provincial del PCCh en Liaoning, y Ge Haiying, secretario del Comite Municipal del PCCh en Dandong.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente expreso agradecimiento a la comitiva de Song Tao por haberse trasladado a esa ciudad fronteriza, muy lejana de la capital, para recibirle.
					
					Song Tao dijo que el vino de Beijing por encargo de Xi Jinping y dio calurosa bienvenida a Kim Jong Un y Ri Sol Ju.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente llego el dia 26 a Beijing.
					
					Le recibieron Wang Huning, miembro del Comite Permanente del Buro Politico y miembro del Secretariado del CC del PCCh, Ding Xuexiang, miembro del Buro Politico y del Secretariado del CC del PCCh y director de la Oficina General del CC del PCCh, Song Tao, jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, Lu Dongfu, administrador general de la Corporacion de Ferrocarril de China, y Li Jinjun, embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de China en la RPDC.
					
					Kim Jong Un intercambio saludos con los cuadros del partido y el gobierno de China que le acogieron.
					
					El convoy del carro en que viajaban Kim Jong Un y Ri Sol Ju se dirigio a la Casa de Huespedes Diaoyutai en compania de la escolta de 21 motocicletas.
					
					Tuvo lugar con solemnidad en el Gran Palacio del Pueblo la ceremonia de bienvenida al Maximo Dirigente.
					
					Tuvieron lugar las conversaciones entre Kim Jong Un y Xi Jinping.
					
					Terminada la charla, Xi Jinping y su senora Peng Liyuan obsequiaron al Maximo Dirigente los regalos preparados con toda sinceridad.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente expreso agradecimiento por el respecto.
					
					Xi Jinping ofrecio en el Gran Palacio del Pueblo un banquete opiparo para dar cordial bienvenida a Kim Jong Un.
					
					El dia 27, el Maximo Dirigente recorrio en la Academia de Ciencias de China la exhibicion de exitos innovadores logrados despues del XVIII Congreso del PCCh.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta visita Choe Ryong Hae, Pak Kwang Ho, Ri Su Yong, Kim Yong Chol y Ri Yong Ho y otros junto con los cuadros chinos Wang Huning, Ding Xuexiang, Cai Qi y Song Tao.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente paso revista a los objetos exhibidos escuchando explicaciones de los exitos logrados en las ciencias y tecnicas naturales como fisica nuclear, espacio cosmico, agricultura y energia.
					
					En memoria de la visita, dejo el siguiente escrito: "Se puede conocer el gran poderio de China, gran pais vecino. Se lograran mejores exitos de ciencia bajo la sabia direccion del Partido Comunista de China. Kim Jong Un. El 27 de marzo de 2018".
					
					El mismo dia, Kim Jong Un y Ri Sol Ju fueron invitados al almuerzo preparado en Yangyuanzhai de la Casa de Huespedes Diaoyutai por Xi Jinping y Peng Liyuan.
					
					Terminado el almuerzo, Kim Jong Un se despidio de Xi Jinping.
					
					Por la tarde del dia 27, el partio de Beijing tras concluir su visita extraoficial a China.
					
					En la Estacion Ferroviaria de Beijing, le despidieron Wang Huning, Ding Xuexiang y Song Tao.
					
					Song Tao, Lu Dongfu y Li Jinjun acompanaron al Maximo Dirigente hasta la Estacion Ferroviaria de Dandong.
					
					Al salir de esta terminal, Kim Jong Un envio un mensaje de agradecimiento a Xi Jinping quien durante la visita, le ha tratado con amistad camaraderil y toda sinceridad.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un conversa con Xi Jinping en el Gran Palacio del Pueblo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un conversa con Xi Jinping en el Gran Palacio del Pueblo
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 26 en el Gran Palacio del Pueblo las conversaciones entre Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y Xi Jinping, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China y de su Comision Militar Central. 
					Los maximos lideres de los dos partidos y paises intercambiaron las opiniones sobre los importantes asuntos, incluso el desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad Corea-China y el manejo de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Kim Jong Un dijo que le complace el primer encuentro significativo con Xi Jinping. 
					
					Afirmo que el Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el gobierno de la RPDC mantienen la firme decision de continuar la valiosa tradicion de la amistad Corea-China, preparada y fortalecida por los lideres de veterana generacion de ambos paises, para llevarla a una nueva etapa elevada conforme a la demanda de la epoca en desarrollo. 
					
					Continuo que se debe frecuentar el encuentro con Xi Jinping y otros companeros chinos para estrechar la amistad y fomentar el intercambio de opiniones estrategicas y la cooperacion estrategica y tactica para consolidar la unidad y la cooperacion bilaterales. 
					
					Manifesto la esperanza de que bajo la correcta guia del Partido Comunista de China centrado en Xi Jinping, el pueblo chino logre notables exitos en el cumplimiento de la causa de construccion de la potencia socialista modernizada de la nueva epoca y en la campana para hacer realidad el sueno de China llamado gran renacimiento de la nacion china. 
					
					Xi Jinping dio calurosa bienvenida al Maximo Dirigente por la visita a China como su primer viaje al extranjero. 
					
					Enfatizo que apreciar, continuar y desarrollar incesantemente la amistad China-Corea, preparada y desarrollada por los lideres de veterana generacion en el curso de contribuir al avance victorioso de la causa socialista con el ideal y conviccion comunes y noble amistad revolucionaria, constituyen la opcion estrategica y firme voluntad del partido y el gobierno de China. 
					
					El cambio positivo, que se da ultimamente en la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, es el fruto de la decision estrategica de Kim Jong Un y de los esfuerzos del partido y el gobierno de Corea, valoro. 
					
					Expuso la conviccion de que bajo la guia del Maximo Dirigente, el PTC alcanzara nuevos exitos en continuar conduciendo al pueblo coreano a la senda del socialismo, desarrollar la economia y mejorar los niveles de la vida poblacional. 
					
					En nombre del partido y el gobierno, Kim Jong Un invito a Xi Jinping para que realice una visita oficial a la RPDC en el tiempo apropiado y la invitacion fue aceptada con placer. 
					
					En las conversaciones participaron por la parte coreana Ri Su Yong y Kim Yong Chol, miembros del Buro Politico y vicepresidentes del Comite Central del PTC, y Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y ministro de Relaciones Exteriores, y por la china, Wang Huning, miembro del Comite Permanente del Buro Politico y del Secretariado del CC del PCCh, Ding Xuexiang, miembro del Buro Politico y del Secretariado del CC del PCCh y director de la Oficina General del CC del PCCh, Huang Kunming, miembro del Buro Politico y del Secretariado del CC del PCCh y jefe del Departamento de Propaganda del CC del PCCh, Yang Jiechi, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PCCh, Wang Yi, consejero de Estado y ministro de Relaciones Exteriores, y Song Tao, jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh.

articles.title: Tiene lugar en el Gran Palacio del Pueblo la ceremonia de recepcion a Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Tiene lugar en el Gran Palacio del Pueblo la ceremonia de recepcion a Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- Se efectuo solemnemente el dia 26 en el Gran Palacio del Pueblo la ceremonia de bienvenida al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y su senora Ri Sol Ju que realizan una visita extraoficial a la Republica Popular China.
					Cuando Kim Jong Un y Ri Sol Ju llegaron a la sede de recepcion, les acogieron cordialmente Xi Jinping, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la RPCh y de su Comision Militar Central, y su senora Peng Liyuan.
					
					Kim Jong Un saludo a Xi Jinping con un fuerte apreton de manos.
					
					Xi Jinping dio calida bienvenida al Maximo Dirigente por su visita a China como primer viaje al extranjero.
					
					Kim Jong Un le expreso profundo agradecimiento por su esmerada atencion a esta visita y su agasajo.
					
					Los matrimonios de ambos dignatarios tomaron una foto de recuerdo.
					
					En Beidating, el Maximo Dirigente saludo a cada uno de los cuadros del partido y el gobierno de China estrechando las manos.
					
					Cuando ambos dignatarios subieron a la tribuna, se interpretaron los himnos nacionales de los dos paises.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente recibio el parte de recepcion del jefe de la Guardia de Honor de las Fuerzas Terrestres, Maritimas y Aereas del Ejercito Popular de Liberacion de China.
					
					Guiado por Xi Jingping, el paso revista a la guardia de honor.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un pronuncia discurso en el banquete ofrecido por Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un pronuncia discurso en el banquete ofrecido por Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un pronuncio un discurso en el banquete opiparo ofrecido por Xi Jinping en el Gran Palacio del Pueblo. 
					El Maximo Dirigente dijo que emprendio esta visita relampago a la Republica Popular China con el deseo de mantener la larga tradicion historica de la gran amistad Corea-China y la obligacion moral revolucionaria en la nueva situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y continuar y desarrollar excelentemente generacion tras generacion las relaciones entre los dos paises. 
					
					Expreso sincero agradecimiento al Secretario General Xi Jinping y su senora Peng Liyuan quienes le tratan con una cordialidad y hospitalidad, que se dan a un hermano propio, dedicando muchas horas aunque estan muy ocupados por atender las cuestiones del partido y el Estado. 
					
					Agrego que esta muy emocionado y agradecido de los esfuerzos sinceros y favores del Secretario General Xi Jinping y los cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado de China quienes aceptaron con placer la propuesta sobre la presente visita y dispensaron gran solicitud para que esta se realice exitosamente en un corto plazo. 
					
					Felicito calurosamente la celebracion exitosa del XIX Congreso del Partido Comunista de China y las "dos conferencias" posteriores y la eleccion del Secretario General Xi Jinping como Presidente de la Republica Popular China y de su Comision Militar Central. 
					
					Es muy natural que el primer destino de mi viaje al extranjero haya sido la capital de China, dijo y anadio que tiene la noble obligacion de apreciar como vida la amistad Corea-China y continuarla generacion tras generacion. 
					
					El pueblo coreano y el chino, que vinieron ayudando y cooperando mutuamente dedicando la sangre y la vida en la lucha conjunta de largo tiempo, experimentaron en su vida que son inseparables sus destinos y conocen muy bien que para los dos paises hermanos colindados por un rio, son muy valiosos el ambiente pacifico y la estabilidad de la region y les cuestan muy caro conquistarlos y defenderlos, destaco.
					
					Continuo que intercambio con el Secretario General Xi Jinping las opiniones profundas sobre los importantes asuntos, incluso el desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad Corea-China y el manejo de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, y reafirmo la voluntad comun de consolidar con firmeza el regimen socialista de los dos paises y asegurar a los pueblos de ambos paises la felicidad y el futuro maravilloso. 
					
					Enfatizo que el Partido del Trabajo y el gobierno de Corea mantienen la firme posicion de fortalecer y desarrollar en nueva etapa las relaciones de amistad Corea-China, que fueron establecidas en la sagrada lucha conjunta por la causa socialista y vinieron manteniendo su caracter original en medio de todos los vientos y mareas de la historia, en acato al noble proposito de los lideres antecesores. 
					
					El PTC y el pueblo coreano estan complacidos, como si fuera el exito propio, de que bajo la orientacion del Partido Comunista de China centrado en el Secretario General Xi Jinping, el pueblo chino alcanzara relevantes exitos en el cumplimiento de la causa de construccion de la potencia socialista modernizada de la nueva epoca y se elevara cada dia mas el prestigio internacional de China, apunto. 
					
					Por ultimo, deseo de todo corazon que bajo la orientacion del Secretario General Xi Jinping, el pueblo chino cumpla perfectamente las tareas presentadas por el XIX Congreso del PCCh y logre la gran prosperidad de la nacion china.

articles.title: Xi Jinping pronuncia discurso en banquete en honor de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Xi Jinping pronuncia discurso en banquete en honor de Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- Xi Jinping pronuncio un discurso en el banquete opiparo ofrecido para dar bienvenida a la visita a China del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					La visita significativa del Presidente Kim Jong Un, realizada en el periodo especial, reviste mucha importancia mostrando plenamente que el y el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea aprecian muchisimo las relaciones entre dos partidos y dos paises, adelanto el dignatario anfitrion.
					
					Prosiguio que la visita es una oportunidad importante para profundizar el intercambio de opiniones, intensificar y promover la cooperacion entre ambas partes.
					
					Aseguro que la presente visita hara aporte importante a elevar a la nueva etapa las relaciones entre los dos partidos y paises en el nuevo periodo historico y a fomentar la paz, la estabilidad y el desarrollo de la region.
					
					La tradicional amistad China-Corea fue preparada y desarrollada a costa de mucho trabajo por los lideres de generacion veterana de los dos partidos y paises, dijo y continuo:
					
					Durante su vida, el Presidente Kim Il Sung visito a China mas de 40 veces y establecio gran amistad con el Presidente Mao Zedong y el primer ministro Zhou Enlai y otros lideres de generacion veterana de China.
					
					La tradicional amistad China-Corea es la unica del mundo, establecida a costa de sangre, y proporciona la felicidad a nuestros dos partidos y pueblos como un arbol bien arraigado y frondoso y un manantial inagotable.
					
					Durante su visita a China realizada en mayo de 2010, el Secretario General Kim Jong Il dijo que la amistad Corea-China es el patrimonio preparado y legado a nosotros por los revolucionarios veteranos y que apreciarla de generacion en generacion es nuestra opcion historica y estrategica y nuestra posicion inconmovible.
					
					A continuacion, Xi Jinping se refirio a las conversaciones que sostuvo con Kim Jong Un en un ambiente amistoso.
					
					Coincidimos en que llevar adelante y glorificar la tradicional amistad China-Corea convienen a los intereses comunes de ambas partes y devienen la opcion estrategica para si mismas, informo y continuo:
					
					Estoy convencido de que sea cual fuera la situacion internacional y la regional, ambas partes procuraran la felicidad de los dos paises y sus pueblos, al tomar el control de la corriente mundial de desarrollo y la coyuntura general de desarrollo de las relaciones bilaterales, frecuentar las visitas de alto nivel, profundizar la comunicacion de opiniones estrategicas y ampliar el intercambio y la cooperacion.
					
					En la actualidad, el Partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de China se esfuerzan y luchan por alcanzar la meta de "dos centurias" y realizar el sueno de China llamado gran renacimiento de la nacion china, segun la indicacion estrategica presentada por el XIX Congreso del PCCh.
					
					El laborioso e inteligente pueblo coreano multiplica los esfuerzos por construir una potencia economica socialista bajo la guia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea encabezado por su Presidente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Al final, Xi Jinping expreso su firme apoyo a los esfuerzos activos de los companeros coreanos por defender la estabilidad politica e impulsar el desarrollo economico.
					
					Formulando votos por los nuevos y mayores exitos de Corea en la causa de construccion del socialismo, expuso su certeza de los mismos.

articles.title: Xi Jinping ofrece banquete en honor de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Xi Jinping ofrece banquete en honor de Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- Xi Jinping, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China y de su Comision Militar Central, ofrecio el dia 26 en el Gran Palacio del Pueblo un banquete opiparo para dar bienvenida a la visita a China de Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Kim Jong Un y su senora Ri Sol Ju salieron al salon de banquete guiados por Xi Jinping y su senora Peng Liyuan.
					
					Todos los participantes en la recepcion acogieron calurosamente a los maximos dirigentes de los dos partidos y paises.
					
					Antes del inicio del banquete, los participantes vieron un video que muestra las actividades de los lideres de ambos partidos y paises quienes prepararon y cultivaron la raiz de la amistad Corea-China.
					
					Dejaron profunda impresion a los espectadores las escenas que transmiten las vidas del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Mao Zedong, Zhou Enlai, Deng Xiaoping, Jiang Zemin, Hu Jintao, Xi Zhongxun y otros lideres de generacion veterana.
					
					En la ocasion, Xi Jinping y Kim Jong Un pronunciaron discursos de felicitacion y respuesta, respectivamente.
					
					La recepcion transcurrio en un clima camaraderil, fraternal y cordial.
					
					Los artistas chinos ofrecieron una funcion preparada especialmente en honor de Kim Jong Un.
					
					Kim Jong Un y Ri Sol Ju entregaron un cesto de flores a los ejecutantes, que prepararon una excelente funcion y expresaron la hospitalidad, y se fotografiaron con ellos en la escena junto con Xi Jinping y Peng Liyuan.
					
					A la recepcion fueron invitados Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y del CC del PTC, Pak Kwang Ho, Ri Su Yong y Kim Yong Chol, miembros del Buro Politico y vicepresidentes del CC del PTC, Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y ministro de Relaciones Exteriores, y otros cuadros y acompanantes.
					
					Fueron invitados tambien el embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC en China, Ji Jae Ryong, y otros miembros de la embajada coreana en China.
					
					Estuvieron presentes Li Keqiang, primer ministro del Consejo de Estado de la RPCh, Wang Huning, miembro del Secretariado del CC del PCCh, y Wang Qishan, vicepresidente de la RPCh, quienes son los miembros del Comite Permanente del Buro Politico del CC del PCCh, Ding Xuexiang, miembro del Buro Politico y del Secretariado del CC del PCCh y director de la Oficina General del CC del PCCh, Yang Jiechi, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PCCh, Guo Shengkun, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PCCh y secretario de la Comision Central de Politicas y Ley, Huang Kunming, miembro del Buro Politico y del Secretariado del CC del PCCh y jefe del Departamento de Propaganda del CC del PCCh, Cai Qi, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PCCh y secretario del comite municipal del PCCh en Beijing, Wang Yi, consejero de Estado y ministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Song Tao, jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, y otros cuadros del partido y el gobierno de China.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un asiste al almuerzo preparado por Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un asiste al almuerzo preparado por Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un fue invitado el dia 27 junto con su senora Ri Sol Ju al almuerzo ofrecido por Xi Jinping y su senora Peng Liyuan en Yangyuanzhai de la Casa de Huespedes Diaoyutai. 
					Cuando el Maximo Dirigente llego a Yangyuanzhai junto con su esposa, el matrimonio de Xi Jinping les acogio con hospitalidad. 
					
					Yangyuanzhai, anejado patrimonio cultural levantado en el ano 1773 como palacio especial del emperador Qianlong de la dinastia Tsing, es el lugar significativo donde el Presidente Kim Il Sung estrecho la amistad con los lideres antecesores de China. 
					
					Kim Jong Un y Ri Sol Ju saludaron a Xi Jinping y Peng Liyuan y tomaron una foto de recuerdo.
					
					Kim Jong Un expreso agradecimiento por esta recepcion especial en el ambiente familiar y sostuvo un dialogo significativo con el dignatario anfitrion. 
					
					Los maximos lideres de los dos partidos y paises profundizaron el sentimiento de amistad expresando francamente sus criterios y opiniones sobre muchos problemas. 
					
					Xi Jinping y Peng Liyuan presentaron a los convidados la cultura de te de China y les condujeron a la sede de almuerzo. 
					
					La recepcion transcurrio en un ambiente cordial y fraternal. 
					
					Este dia, el Maximo Dirigente y su senora entregaron al matrimonio del dignatario chino el regalo preparado con toda sinceridad. 
					
					Terminado el almuerzo, Kim Jong Un volvio a expresar agradecimiento a Xi Jinping por el trato hospitalario durante su visita e intercambio con el los saludos de despedida.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de agradecimiento a Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de agradecimiento a Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 28 un mensaje de agradecimiento a Xi Jinping, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					En este momento de repatriacion despues de la conclusion exitosa de mi primera visita a la Republica Popular China, amistoso pais vecino, les agradezco de todo corazon a Vd., los cuadros del centro y la ciudad de Beijing y los habitantes chinos quienes nos acogieron y trataron con hospitalidad.
					
					Nuestro primer encuentro, efectuado en el periodo importante en que la causa socialista de ambos pueblos entro en la nueva etapa de desarrollo, devino  la oportunidad magnifica que marco hito trascendental para continuar y desarrollar la tradicional amistad Corea-China segun las demandas de la nueva epoca.
					
					Satisfecho del consenso logrado con Vd. en los problemas de interes mutuo durante el presente encuentro y las conversaciones, manifiesto la seguridad de que en lo adelante, la amistad Corea-China, noble herencia y patrimonio comun legado por los precursores de la revolucion, se fortalecera y se desarrollara sin parar conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de ambos paises.
					
					Formulo votos por la buena salud de Vd. deseando igualmente que el hermano pueblo chino logre grandes exitos en la construccion del socialismo con peculiaridades chinas de la nueva epoca bajo la guia del CC del Partido Comunista de China centrado en Vd.

articles.title: ACNC comenta nueva accion provocativa de belicistas surcoreanos
articles.content:
ACNC comenta nueva accion provocativa de belicistas surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ACNC) -- A contrapelo de la corriente hacia la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas, los belicistas del circulo militar surcoreano se entregan con mas frenesi al aumento armamentista y la campana de enfrentamiento militar contra la connacional RPDC. 
					Para emplazar nuevos medios de ataque capaces de destruir con precision en el tiempo de emergencia las principales instalaciones militares de la RPDC, ellos intentan importar desde Alemania dentro del mes en curso mas de 170 misiles aire-tierra de largo alcance "Taurus" como primera etapa y mas de 90 en el periodo 2019-2020 como la segunda. 
					
					Segun trascendidos, anunciando el perfeccionamiento del "nuevo OPLAN" que supone el despliegue en las fuerzas aereas de 40 F-35A de fabricacion norteamericana y neutralizar dentro de unas horas a la Direccion Suprema y la principal fuerza combativa de la RPDC, estan revisando el proyecto de asegurar pronto mas de 2 mil 600 misiles balisticos de diferentes tipos. 
					
					Tal movimiento belicoso del circulo militar surcoreano muestra su intento de romper el clima de mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas, preparado a duras penas, y enfrentarse militarmente hasta el final con la parte connacional. 
					
					Entonces, ?tienen alguna relacion con el dialogo y la mejora de vinculos la introduccion de los misiles "Taurus", considerados como medio principal del sistema "Kill Chain", y otros medios de ataque contra los puntos estrategicos de la RPDC y la fundacion de la brigada de ataque contra los canones de largo alcance de esta parte connacional? 
					
					Es absurdo hablar del dialogo hostilizando al interlocutor. 
					
					La campana provocativa de los belicistas surcoreanos es una repeticion del proceder de los anteriores "poderes" conservadores que solamente engendraron el circulo vicioso de enfrentamiento y ruptura de vinculos intercoreanos insistiendo en el "enfrentamiento con dialogo". 
					
					La historia de las relaciones Norte-Sur ensena la leccion de que si una parte abriga la antipatia sobre la otra, no se puede lograr la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales ni surte efecto ningun acuerdo. 
					
					A citar por ejemplo, quedo invalidada en un instante la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio por culpa del dictador de "Yusin" que se aferraba a la campana conflictiva hablando del "enfrentamiento con dialogo".
					
					Ademas, las bandas traidoras de Lee Myung Bak y Park Geun-hye llevaron las relaciones intercoreanas a la ruptura violando flagrantemente los valiosos acuerdos Norte-Sur. 
					
					Son incompatibles el dialogo y el enfrentamiento. 
					
					El siniestro alboroto militar evidencia que las autoridades surcoreanas hablan mucho del dialogo y la paz, pero suenan con otra cosa. 
					
					Las actuales relaciones intercoreanas y la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana demandan decir y actuar con seriedad. 
					
					Los belicistas surcoreanos deben dejar su acto absurdo de amenazar o atentar con fuerza contra la connacional RPDC. 
					
					El "enfrentamiento con dialogo" causara solo la calamidad irreparable.
